# Research Summary

Research completed on TypeScript testing ecosystem for GSD memory server.

## Key Findings

- Vitest is the standard for TypeScript projects
- Gray-matter handles YAML frontmatter parsing
- MCP SDK provides standard server implementation

## Recommendations

1. Use Vitest for all tests
2. Use gray-matter for frontmatter extraction
3. Follow MCP SDK patterns for tool implementation
